title: Looking for Trouble
description: Cornered rebel, with nowhere left to run, seeks miracle... The time has finally come when The Pan of Hamgee must stand up and be counted. He must face his demons and rectify the chaos he has caused. There’s a chance he can stop Lord Vernon, but to succeed he has to stay alive. He must keep his head down and maintain a low profile. He must be brave and clever and stay in control. And he hasn’t a clue how to do any of it. Written in British English with a little light swearing.Suggested cinema rating: PG=> This book is the final part of a series which is best enjoyed when read in sequence. <=
author: M.T. McGuire
